title: Sisal Soap Bag
subTitle: The practical and eco-friendly accessory for storing and use your soap.

marketingArguments.title: Sustainable & Biodegradable
marketingArguments.speech: Made of natural Plant Fiber, durable for a long time to use.

marketingArguments.title: The best solution to extend soap life
marketingArguments.speech: Put the soap in the bag. and let the soap dry quickly so as to for a longer time

marketingArguments.title: Stimulates Blood Circulation
marketingArguments.speech: You can use it for soap, shower gel, and cleansing lotion. It allows to massage and stimulate circulation in your shower

marketingArguments.title: Tighten design
marketingArguments.speech: Adapts to the size of your soap, just pull the string to tighten it. Easy to take out and put back
